tvm.name: Time Value of Money (TVM)
tvm.description: Calculate present value, future value, interest rates, number of periods, and payments

cf.name: Cash Flow (CF)
cf.description: Calculate NPV and IRR for uneven cash flows

data.name: Statistics (DATA)
data.description: Calculate mean, standard deviation, regression statistics

percent_change.name: Percent Change
percent_change.description: Calculate percentage change between two values

memory.name: Memory Storage
memory.description: Store and recall values (up to 10 memories: 0-9)
